>
[Breastplate of Command](/Equipment.aspx?ID=148)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 557 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 resilient [breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10)_ is made from shining bronze overlaid with reinforcing golden panels in the shape of lion’s heads. Wearing this breastplate grants you a commanding aura. You gain a +2 item bonus to Diplomacy checks, but you take a –2 item penalty to Stealth checks to Hide and Sneak and Deception checks to Impersonate.
